Condition.name: Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity contains "Extremely Inculpatory"
Condition.expression:
Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity|contains("Extremely Inculpatory")

/* list contains(Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity,"Extremely Inculpatory") */

Condition.name: Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity contains "Inculpatory"
Condition.expression:
Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity|contains("Inculpatory")
/* list contains(Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity,"Inculpatory") */

Condition.name: Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity contains "Protecting"
Condition.expression:
Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity|contains("Protecting")
/* list contains(Insured Customer Accident Circumstances.Gravity,"Protecting") */
